description: This is one of the Mission Woodlot classics, with sweet bridges, ramps, logs, teeter totters, skinnies and drops.  What more could you and your bike want?  With plenty of challenges, this ride hooks up with great fall line riding from Blood Donor, and flows nicely into Hoots.
directions:
Head to Maple Ridge and stop at either High Gear Bike or Maple Ridge Cycle and ask directions.  Once at the Woodlot, hook up with a local.
More Mission Woodlot trails can be found here 
Helmet Cam Video Footage Giant Killer
 
more mountain biking videos can be found here
title: Woodlot - Giant Killer
